title: Bookstore Manager
description: A secure Spring Boot Java application designed to manage inventory without complex database overhead.

title: Face Mask Detection
description: Real-time AI system utilizing MobileNetV2 to classify video streams into 'Mask' or 'No Mask' categories.

title: SSH Honeypot
description: A cybersecurity deception tool designed to simulate a vulnerable server, trapping attackers and logging their credentials for threat analysis.
